manual.title: TaskManager User Manual
manual.introduction: Welcome to TaskManager, a tool for organizing and tracking your teamâ€™s tasks efficiently. This manual covers installation, usage, and troubleshooting.

step.instruction: Run the installer and follow the on-screen prompts.
Log in using your company email and temporary password.

feature.description: To create a task, click the "New Task" button, enter the task name, assign a team member, and set a due date.
To reset your password, go to Settings > Account > Reset Password and follow the link sent to your email.

issue.solution: Ensure your system meets the minimum requirements (Windows 10 or macOS 12, 8GB RAM). Update to the latest version from www.taskmanager.com/update. Contact support@taskmanager.com if the issue persists.

issue.problem: Unable to log in due to incorrect credentials.
issue.solution: Verify your email and password. Use the "Forgot Password" link to reset your password.
